lines.text: [after sex]
Earth women who experience sexual ecstasy with mechanical assistance always tend to feel guilty!
this is the pact. But when life loses its meaning and is taken for naught, then the pact is to avenge!
The U.N. Building. What a joke! They turned it into low rent housing. It's a dump.

[as a nude redhead begins intercourse with him]
Sucker play or not, I must have turned her on somethin' fierce. I mean, this dame was goin' for broke. Maybe it was her first time with a New Yorker, I dunno. Anyway, nothing beats good old American know-how. And I was givin' this broad the Stars And Stripes For Ever.
If you refuse, you die; she dies... everybody dies!

He's nothing but a low-down, double-dealing, backstabbing, larcenous perverted worm! Hanging's too good for him. Burning's too good for him! He should be torn into little bitsy pieces and buried alive!

[to Robot]
I'm just scared I'll come home one day and find you screwing a toaster.
Hey, do we have any of that Plutonian Nyborg left?
Uh, yeah. Just one bag. Uh, it's in the transmitter compartment.
Thanks, man.
Oh, great.
[lays out a long, thick Nyborg line on floor]
Think this is enough?
Uhh... nah. Go for broke.
Good thinking, man.
[lays Nyborg all over the floor in overlapping heavy lines]

[in jubilant unison]
Nose dive!
Are you Captain Lincoln F. Sternn?
I am.

Lincoln Sternn, you stand here accused of 12 counts of murder in the first degree, 14 counts of armed theft of Federation property, 22 counts of piracy in high space, 18 counts of fraud, 37 counts of rape...
[pauses to check rap sheet]
... and one moving violation. How do you plead?
Not guilty.

[as the Queen presents her disrobed body to him]
Wow, 18 years of nothing, and now twice in one day ! What a place.
[looking at a beautiful, naked woman with huge breasts]

[voiceover]
She had the most beautiful eyes. I wanted to make some conversation. But I found myself asking the same old stupid questions.
[to woman]
... Are you from around here ?

[completely wasted from Nyborg]
I think... you're coming in a little high, man.

[wasted from Nyborg, but more lucid]
Look, man, if there's one thing I know, it's how to drive while I'm stoned. It's like you know your perspective's fucked so you just let your hands work the controls as if you were straight.
There was no way I was gonna walk around this place with my dork hanging out!

[gloating over Taarna, who is bound naked to a torture rack]
So this is the Taarakian. Somehow, I thought it would be more difficult to capture a Taarakian.
Before you go any further, pal, I gotta tell ya it's cash up front. A thousand bucks a day for a full investigation, another thou' if the assailant is caught. Do you understand?
Yeah. Hey, here's a dollar. Thanks for nothin'.
Think you can do better?... Punk.
[first lines]
A shadow shall fall over the universe, and evil will grow in its path, and death will come from the skies.

[repeated line to lawyer]
Take it easy Charlie. I've got an angle.
The first Earth chick we see in 10 years and he has to make a play for her.
He never did... anything that was... illegal...
[pauses]
Unless you count all the times he sold dope disguised as a nun.

[the fifth story, "So Beautiful, So Dangerous" ends. the space station fades away]
My stories are almost over. I have chosen you because you are the future who could destroy me. With your death, I break the chain for all time. Look into me, one final time. See my evil destroy your race. Then prepare to die.
[the final story, "Taarna" begins]

[Den and Catharine fly off, ending the second story. the Loc-Nar breaks out of the scepter]
Even when someone has the strength to discard me, my power is not diminished.
[the orb rises through the air and into a space station. a hand picks it up off the floor]
Someone always finds me.
[the third story, "Captain Sternn" begins]

[Hanover's hand rots away while it holds the orb]
Very few escape my grasp.
[the sky cuts to a group of army planes]
Even in death, my powers continue.
[the fourth story, "B-17" begins]

[the first story, "Harry Canyon" ends]
You've had your first lesson, young one. My evil corrupts the most innocent. I've chosen you because you possess powers you do not yet understand. look again. Look deep into me. In some worlds, I'm worshiped as God.
[the second story begins, "Den"]

[the astronaut comes home with a grey box. he is greeted by his daughter]
What did you bring me?
You'll see.
[the astronaut goes into the parlor. his daughter follows]

[she runs after him]
Wait, wait for me. What is it?
I am the sum of all evils. Look carefully. My power infests all times, all galaxies, all dimensions. But many still seek me out; a green jewel they must possess. But see how I destroy their lives.
[the screen cuts to the first story]

[the leader emerges from the Loc-Nar's evil/lava ooze, deformed and sinister]
Death. Death ! Death to all who oppose us!
I am Ard... Supreme Leader of The Revolution and Next Ruler of The World.
May I slit his throat, Your Majesty?
Yes. Slit his throat.
Thank you, Your Majesty!

[to Stern]
But the most we can hope for is to get you buried in secrecy so your grave don't get violated!
Neverwhere is a troubled land. Your great strength has brought peace to my restless body. It can bring great peace to all the people of this land.
I knew I was good. But I didn't know I was that good.
I forgot... are you circumcised?

[after Ard informs Den he must steal the Loc-Nar from the Queen in order to save Catherine]
And if I refuse?
If you refuse, you die, she dies, *everybody dies*!

[voiceover]
Sounded reasonable to me!
Hey, kiss my ass!
I'll do it for twenty bucks !
